content.question: Which of the following Boolean expressions correctly models a gate with inputs and ?

choices.label: Open parenthesis, NOT P, close parenthesis, and, open parenthesis, NOT Q, close parenthesis
Open parenthesis, NOT P, close parenthesis, and Q
NOT, open parenthesis, P AND Q, close parenthesis
NOT, open parenthesis, P OR Q, close parenthesis

content.answer: NOT, open parenthesis, P AND Q, close parenthesis

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
